alert.note: Alert for Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 10:40AM CDT until April 28 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pembina River at Neche. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. Residential damage begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 8.3 feet and then begin rising this afternoon. It will then rise above flood stage early Monday afternoon to 18.9 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning to 16.9 feet and then begin rising early Friday morning then rise again. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
